    (Multiplier > 2.3, Justification \= '');
    (Multiplier < 2.3, Description \= '').

is_invoice_invalid(Invoice) :-
    Invoice = invoice(Services, _, _, _),
    member(service(_, _, Multiplier, _, _, Description, Justification, _), Services),
    \+ is_multiplier_justified(Multiplier, Description, Justification),
    print('Invalid invoice: Multiplier for a service is not justified.'),
    true.
